selected_quotes: New @Science_Open paper shows that #opendata is crucial for detecting scientifc fraud and testing research validity
Check out the latest public post-publication peer review
Many current programs for fraud detection focus on image manipulation A #ScienceOpen worth reading
New #OA study on fraud in science: Statistical Analysis of Numerical Preclinical Radiobiological Data by Helene Hill
Any stats wizards want to openly peer review this paper on clinical data fraud? #openscience #rst…

blogs.title: What are the barriers to post-publication peer review?
